column1: Little Goat Diner////The five stars is because you're so very typically excellent. I have dreams of your kimchee reuben
column2: the fact that you carry Stumptown cold brews
column3: the goat milk in your lattes
column4: your blood orange meringue pie (which I always order to go because I cannot live without it)
column6: and your roller-derby-goth-punk-princess uniforms that house the friendliest and funnest and most affable staff a restaurant could hope to boast.
